subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In his fifth game as a Knick, Tracy McGrady bowed to a sore left knee and became a spectator as the Knicks withered in a 120-109 loss to the Grizzlies at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: In his fifth game as a Knick, Tracy McGrady bowed to a sore left knee and became a spectator as the Knicks withered in a 120-109 loss to the Grizzlies at Madison Square Garden.
